Show HN: Eclipse: Python-fire inspired library to simplify creating CLIs in Go
text:
I'm a Go noob (coming from Python) and was missing python-fire's simplicity when writing quick CLIs in Go, hence this project.

I know this is not idiomatic Go (with magic methods and what not), I tried to minimize the magic as much as I could while still bringing most of the features I was using in python-fire.

Any feedback is appreciated!

Ask HN: I submitted a link to a YouTube Vice documentary and it got flagged?
text:
I just submitted a link to a YouTube Vice TV documentary and it got instantly flagged. I don't understand why it did...

It was about how Narcissism is growing in the World... HN edited the title of my post at submission, so I don't think there was really any way I could manage to add more context to the original title.

I won't add the link here unless requested. Hoping a mod can tell me why, because I don't want to be flagged again... Thanks,
